default_settings.name: WEEKDAY_CLOSING_TIME
default_settings.value: e.g 17:00 or none - The time the office closes on the weekend. Use 'None' if no office hours on the weekend

default_settings.name: WEEKEND_CLOSING_TIME
default_settings.value: e.g 17:08 - The time the office closes during the weekdays

default_settings.name: OFFICE_CLOSED_COMMENT
default_settings.value: Message to display when the office is closed

desc: An after-hours bot that announces that the office has closed
name: after-hours-bot
short_desc: An after-hours bot that announces that the office has closed
